file_content.text: Doctor Godera is in the main lab. He's surrounded. Hurry!
A Jedi! We're saved!
Please, you must help. Imperials shot my friend. They want Doctor Godera. They're everywhere!
I'm here to save the doctor. Where will I find him?
Tell me where Godera is.
How do you know Doctor Godera?
Who are you two?
We came with him to Taris, years ago. Helped him build these outposts.
How did you manage to escape the Imperials?
Not here, apparently.
They left us for dead. They only want the doctor.
He's barricaded himself in the main lab. He can't hold out much longer.
You're the only one who can help. Hurry!
Keep out of sight and protect your friend.
Stay safe.
I will. Thank you.
You can lift a blaster. Come with me and fight.
You could at least help.
I can't abandon my friend. He's badly wounded.
If Imperial reinforcements arrive, defend this corridor with your lives. Got me?
Hold this position.
We'll do our best.
The main lab is surrounded by Imperials. Good luck, Jedi!
Imperials attacked us. Came out of nowhere.
